articles.description: Carlos Sainz reckons Ferrari can “play a better game” to battle Red Bull in future Formula 1 races after failing to challenge its 2022 rival team for victory in Bahrain.
articles.content: The Spaniard classified fourth in the season opener and was 48s adrift of runaway winner Max Verstappen at the flag, while team-mate Charles Leclerc retired with a power unit electrical failure on la… [+2059 chars]

articles.author: Rob Dawson
articles.title: Man United takeover meetings seek to bridge gap in valuations - sources - ESPN India
articles.description: Man United have focused on explaining the Glazer family's valuation of the club as they meet potential buyers and investors, sources told ESPN.
articles.content: Manchester United have focused on explaining the Glazer family's valuation of the club as they meet potential buyers and investors after being underwhelmed by the opening expressions of interest, sou… [+2734 chars]
